title: SOCIAL STUDIES CLASS THREE
body: Hello pupils, welcome to class three social studies. In class two we learnt about living together in our school and the neighbourhood. In class three we shall learn about living together in the sub-county. Lets learn and enjoy.

title: Want to know more about our components
displayTitle: Want to know more about our components
body: Adapt's power comes from being able to switch out and mix 'n' match components. Some span the whole page, whilst others are single width. We've split the presentation and question components to give you a better overview of Adapt. Select an option below to read more.

_graphic.alt: Want to know more about our components

title: Adapt comes with some plugins too
displayTitle: Adapt comes with some plugins too
body: Built with a plugin architecture - Adapt enables developers to create engaging plugins that enhance Adapt's core. View this page to see an assessment mixed with vertical step locking.

_graphic.alt: Adapt comes with some plugins too

title: Presentation components
body: These components are used to display content in a meaning and compelling way across multiple devices.

title: Question components
body: These components are used to test the learners ability and understanding of a course/piece of learning.
